original_text: And there was one named Barabbas, which lay bound with them that had made insurrection with him, who had committed murder in the insurrection.
korean_text: 민란을 꾸미고 그 민란중에 살인하고 체포된 자 중에 바라바라 하는 자가 있는지라

sentences.original_text: And there was one named Barabbas
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 바라바라고 불리는 한 사람이 있었는데

sentences.original_text: with them that had made insurrection with him
sentences.korean_translation: 그와 함께 반란을 일으킨 자들과 함께

sentences.original_text: who had committed murder in the insurrection
sentences.korean_translation: 그 반란 중에 살인을 저질렀던 자였습니다
